title: Stripe, Inc.
deleted: In October 2020, Stripe announced [http://stripe.com/climate|Stripe Climate], a product for enabling businesses to fund atmospheric carbon [[Carbon capture and storage|research and capture]]. This came a year after Stripe's [https://stripe.com/blog/negative-emissions-commitment|negative emissions commitment], where Stripe announced that they would become one of the first commercial purchasers of negative carbon emissions.

title: Stripe, Inc.
deleted: On October 15, 2020, Stripe announced a $200 million plus acquisition of Paystack in which it had previously invested, making it the biggest acquisition of a Nigerian tech company.<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://techcrunch.com/2020/10/15/stripe-acquires-nigerias-paystack-for-200m-to-expand-into-the-african-continent/|title=Stripe acquires Nigeriaâ€™s Paystack for $200M+ to expand into the African continent|website=TechCrunch|language=en-US|access-date=2020-10-15}}</ref>
